definitions.definition: beefsteak , a slice of beef , broiled or cut for broiling.
A relatively large, thick slice or slab cut from another animal, a vegetable, etc.
A slice of meat cut across the grain (perpendicular to the spine) from a fish .

main_definition: beefsteak , a slice of beef , broiled or cut for broiling.
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) A relatively large, thick slice or slab cut from another animal, a vegetable, etc.
A slice of meat cut across the grain (perpendicular to the spine) from a fish .
